mapper.insert: insert into tbl_chat_room(chnum, id, userid, hostNick, roomNick, maxNum, content) values(#{chnum}, #{id}, #{userid}, #{hostNick}, #{roomNick},#{maxNum},#{content})
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_chat_room where chnum = #{chnum}
select * from tbl_chat_room where id = #{id} ORDER BY regdate ASC

select t1.id hostId, t1.status status, t1.chnum, t1.currentNum, t1.hostNick, t1.roomNick, t1.maxNum, IFNULL(t2.validate, 0) validate, t1.regdate regdate, t2.requestdate requestdate, t2.updatedate updatedate from tbl_chat_room t1 left join (select * from tbl_chat_validate where id= #{id}) t2 on t1.chnum = t2.chnum order by regdate desc;
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_chat_validate(id, chnum, validate) values(#{id}, #{chnum}, 1);
mapper.select: select va.id userid, ro.roomnick roomnick, ro.chnum chnum, va.validate validate, va.requestdate requestdate, ro.status status from tbl_chat_validate va right join (select * from tbl_chat_room where id=#{id}) ro on va.chnum = ro.chnum where validate = 1;
select currentNum from tbl_chat_room where chnum = #{chnum};
select userid from tbl_chat_room where chnum = #{chnum}
